meanings.definition: Cooked over an open flame or hot coals
meanings.sent1: The barbequed chicken had a delicious smoky flavor.
meanings.sent2: The ribs were perfectly barbequed and tender.
meanings.sent3: The barbequed sausages made everyone's mouth water.
meanings.sent4: The barbequed aroma filled the backyard, enticing neighbors.
meanings.sent5: The barbequed steak was a hit at the picnic.

meanings.definition: To cook (food) on a barbecue grill
meanings.sent1: We barbequed burgers and hot dogs for the party.
meanings.sent2: Dad will barbeque the chicken for dinner tonight.
meanings.sent3: She barbequed the vegetables to perfection.
meanings.sent4: The chef barbequed the fish with a special marinade.
meanings.sent5: They barbequed marshmallows over the campfire.

meanings.definition: The act of grilling food on a barbecue grill
meanings.sent1: The barbequed at the park was a fun event.
meanings.sent2: We had a barbequed with friends last weekend.
meanings.sent3: The family organized a barbequed for the neighborhood.
meanings.sent4: She won first place in the barbequed competition.
meanings.sent5: The smell of barbequed filled the air at the festival.
